PageWidgetPortable.Title: Por fam√≠lia
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>TR_ESTADOTRIBUTOS.FAMILIA.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> A.ESTADO IS NOT NULL AND A.FAMILIA IS NOT NULL AND A.PRODUTO IS NULL AND A.FAMILIA IN (SELECT FAMILIA.HANDLE FROM PD_FAMILIASPRODUTOS FAMILIA WHERE FAMILIA.HANDLE = A.FAMILIA AND FAMILIA.EMPRESA IN (@EMPRESAMESTRE(PD_FAMILIASPRODUTOS)) ) AND A.ESTADO = @CAMPO(ESTADO) AND A.IMPOSTO = @CAMPO(IMPOSTO)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t829_at1800_hsc0bbd669.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
